backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing feedback entries with submit, query, filtering and sorting capabilities based on age, date, and fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting addition of Indonesian language support and associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for major frontend files such as App, forms, tables, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component providing layout, language selector, feedback form, PIN-gated feedback table, and external site link.
frontend/src/components/FeedbackForm.tsx: Multilingual form component validating and submitting feedback fields and resetting on success.
frontend/src/components/FeedbackTable.ts: Scrollable feedback table showing all entries with formatted timestamps, loading states, and multilingual headers.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown selector allowing users to switch between fifteen languages with flags and codes.
frontend/src/components/PinDialog.tsx: A PIN entry dialog that validates a fixed PIN, shows success or error toasts, and notifies parent on success.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a language context with translation dictionaries for multiple locales.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, handling access control initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, identity persistence, and login state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all feedback and submitting feedback through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables and utility rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, query client, and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both normal and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom screens, radius, OKLCH-based color system, and includes animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, including metadata, known issues, and a pending feature request to add Indonesian language support.
